		<title>Film at Berlin fest examines how Islamic State jihadists recruit European brides</title>

		<description>BERLIN (Reuters) - A movie at the Berlin film festival that looks at how Islamic State fighters recruit young European women online highlights the dangers of using the internet, the actress in the starring role told Reuters.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=lKi3OBulcRk:-klmB_e5-BY:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=lKi3OBulcRk:-klmB_e5-BY:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?i=lKi3OBulcRk:-klmB_e5-BY:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=lKi3OBulcRk:-klmB_e5-BY:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?i=lKi3OBulcRk:-klmB_e5-BY:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/INentertainmentNews/~4/lKi3OBulcRk" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/INentertainmentNews/~3/lKi3OBulcRk/film-at-berlin-fest-examines-how-islamic-state-jihadists-recruit-european-brides-idINKCN1G20J2</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://in.reuters.com/article/filmfestival-berlin-profile/film-at-berlin-fest-examines-how-islamic-state-jihadists-recruit-european-brides-idINKCN1G20J2?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</guid>
        <category>entertainmentNews</category>
		<pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 18:50:57 +0530</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://in.reuters.com/article/filmfestival-berlin-profile/film-at-berlin-fest-examines-how-islamic-state-jihadists-recruit-european-brides-idINKCN1G20J2?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Weinstein Company removes president and chief operating officer Glasser</title>

		<description>(Reuters) - The board of the Weinstein Company has dismissed the beleaguered film studio's president and chief operating officer, less than a week after he was cited for failing to act on employee harassment complaints.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=rVnKhlExtwo:zldC2HshkdE:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=rVnKhlExtwo:zldC2HshkdE:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?i=rVnKhlExtwo:zldC2HshkdE:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=rVnKhlExtwo:zldC2HshkdE:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?i=rVnKhlExtwo:zldC2HshkdE:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/INentertainmentNews/~4/rVnKhlExtwo" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/INentertainmentNews/~3/rVnKhlExtwo/weinstein-company-removes-president-and-chief-operating-officer-glasser-idINKCN1G2015</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://in.reuters.com/article/people-harvey-weinstein/weinstein-company-removes-president-and-chief-operating-officer-glasser-idINKCN1G2015?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</guid>
        <category>entertainmentNews</category>
		<pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 08:38:09 +0530</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://in.reuters.com/article/people-harvey-weinstein/weinstein-company-removes-president-and-chief-operating-officer-glasser-idINKCN1G2015?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>French star Isabelle Huppert glad women are speaking up about harassment</title>

		<description>BERLIN (Reuters) - French actress Isabelle Huppert said on Saturday she was pleased that women were speaking up about their experiences of sexual abuse and harassment after staying silent for so long.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=igNpbIfzAiw:Oax0Drtjpvg:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=igNpbIfzAiw:Oax0Drtjpvg:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?i=igNpbIfzAiw:Oax0Drtjpvg:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=igNpbIfzAiw:Oax0Drtjpvg:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?i=igNpbIfzAiw:Oax0Drtjpvg:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/INentertainmentNews/~4/igNpbIfzAiw" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/INentertainmentNews/~3/igNpbIfzAiw/french-star-isabelle-huppert-glad-women-are-speaking-up-about-harassment-idINKCN1G201D</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://in.reuters.com/article/filmfestival-berlin-eva/french-star-isabelle-huppert-glad-women-are-speaking-up-about-harassment-idINKCN1G201D?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</guid>
        <category>entertainmentNews</category>
		<pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 08:28:29 +0530</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://in.reuters.com/article/filmfestival-berlin-eva/french-star-isabelle-huppert-glad-women-are-speaking-up-about-harassment-idINKCN1G201D?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Burberry shows its colours for designer Bailey's swansong</title>

		<description>LONDON (Reuters) - Burberry's star designer Christopher Bailey bid goodbye to the British brand on Saturday with a colour-infused show, showcasing designs with a rainbow twist on the label's famed check print on a catwalk lit with laser beams.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=w9_Gwp7Cp-k:0Oka0xc70AE:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=w9_Gwp7Cp-k:0Oka0xc70AE:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?i=w9_Gwp7Cp-k:0Oka0xc70AE:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=w9_Gwp7Cp-k:0Oka0xc70AE:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?i=w9_Gwp7Cp-k:0Oka0xc70AE:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/INentertainmentNews/~4/w9_Gwp7Cp-k" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/INentertainmentNews/~3/w9_Gwp7Cp-k/burberry-shows-its-colours-for-designer-baileys-swansong-idINKCN1G2013</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://in.reuters.com/article/fashion-london-burberry/burberry-shows-its-colours-for-designer-baileys-swansong-idINKCN1G2013?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</guid>
        <category>entertainmentNews</category>
		<pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 08:34:33 +0530</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://in.reuters.com/article/fashion-london-burberry/burberry-shows-its-colours-for-designer-baileys-swansong-idINKCN1G2013?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Drake gives away almost $1 million in 'God's Plan' music video</title>

		<description>LOS ANGELES (Reuters) - The song is called "God's Plan" and Canadian rapper Drake dropped a music video to match on Friday in which he gave away almost $1 million in cash to people in Miami.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=_0mjI5o05B8:2PreAuoZu2s:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=_0mjI5o05B8:2PreAuoZu2s:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?i=_0mjI5o05B8:2PreAuoZu2s:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=_0mjI5o05B8:2PreAuoZu2s:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?i=_0mjI5o05B8:2PreAuoZu2s:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/INentertainmentNews/~4/_0mjI5o05B8" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/INentertainmentNews/~3/_0mjI5o05B8/drake-gives-away-almost-1-million-in-gods-plan-music-video-idINKCN1G1007</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://in.reuters.com/article/music-drake/drake-gives-away-almost-1-million-in-gods-plan-music-video-idINKCN1G1007?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</guid>
        <category>entertainmentNews</category>
		<pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 05:38:53 +0530</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://in.reuters.com/article/music-drake/drake-gives-away-almost-1-million-in-gods-plan-music-video-idINKCN1G1007?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>South Korean filmmaker hopeful Olympics will improve ties with North</title>

		<description>BERLIN (Reuters) - South Korean filmmaker Kim Ki-duk said on Saturday he hoped for an improvement in relations between North and South Korea given both countries were taking part in the Olympics on the southern part of the peninsula.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=JVdKELWJYRk:Uk2YuRRgMIU:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=JVdKELWJYRk:Uk2YuRRgMIU:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?i=JVdKELWJYRk:Uk2YuRRgMIU:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=JVdKELWJYRk:Uk2YuRRgMIU:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?i=JVdKELWJYRk:Uk2YuRRgMIU:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/INentertainmentNews/~4/JVdKELWJYRk" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/INentertainmentNews/~3/JVdKELWJYRk/south-korean-filmmaker-hopeful-olympics-will-improve-ties-with-north-idINKCN1G10OE</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://in.reuters.com/article/filmfestival-berlin-korea/south-korean-filmmaker-hopeful-olympics-will-improve-ties-with-north-idINKCN1G10OE?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</guid>
        <category>entertainmentNews</category>
		<pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 21:34:43 +0530</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://in.reuters.com/article/filmfestival-berlin-korea/south-korean-filmmaker-hopeful-olympics-will-improve-ties-with-north-idINKCN1G10OE?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Russian film set in Soviet era highlights continuing tensions: director</title>

		<description>BERLIN (Reuters) - Russia always seems to be on the brink of war and conditions there now are much like they were in the 1970s, when people worried that an international conflict would break out and  largely sided with the government, the director of a new movie set in that era has said.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=GjTjHVgBR1A:FfKbzKDFt_8:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=GjTjHVgBR1A:FfKbzKDFt_8:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?i=GjTjHVgBR1A:FfKbzKDFt_8:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=GjTjHVgBR1A:FfKbzKDFt_8:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?i=GjTjHVgBR1A:FfKbzKDFt_8:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/INentertainmentNews/~4/GjTjHVgBR1A" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/INentertainmentNews/~3/GjTjHVgBR1A/russian-film-set-in-soviet-era-highlights-continuing-tensions-director-idINKCN1G10M5</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://in.reuters.com/article/filmfestival-berlin-dovlatov/russian-film-set-in-soviet-era-highlights-continuing-tensions-director-idINKCN1G10M5?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</guid>
        <category>entertainmentNews</category>
		<pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 20:26:05 +0530</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://in.reuters.com/article/filmfestival-berlin-dovlatov/russian-film-set-in-soviet-era-highlights-continuing-tensions-director-idINKCN1G10M5?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Nigerian cinema fans celebrate 'Black Panther' release</title>

		<description>LAGOS (Reuters) - Film fans, actors and comic enthusiasts in Nigeria's commercial capital Lagos have been flocking to screenings of Marvel superhero movie "Black Panther" which opened in Africa's most populous country this week.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=zdneq8eYAIU:7rWHjPARjWM:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=zdneq8eYAIU:7rWHjPARjWM:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?i=zdneq8eYAIU:7rWHjPARjWM:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=zdneq8eYAIU:7rWHjPARjWM:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?i=zdneq8eYAIU:7rWHjPARjWM:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/INentertainmentNews/~4/zdneq8eYAIU" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/INentertainmentNews/~3/zdneq8eYAIU/nigerian-cinema-fans-celebrate-black-panther-release-idINKCN1G02M8</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://in.reuters.com/article/film-blackpanther-africa/nigerian-cinema-fans-celebrate-black-panther-release-idINKCN1G02M8?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</guid>
        <category>entertainmentNews</category>
		<pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 05:31:12 +0530</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://in.reuters.com/article/film-blackpanther-africa/nigerian-cinema-fans-celebrate-black-panther-release-idINKCN1G02M8?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>British actor Robert Pattinson says he does not believe in true love</title>

		<description>BERLIN (Reuters) - British actor Robert Pattinson does not believe in true love, he said at the Berlin Film Festival on Friday, in contrast to the lovestruck pioneer he portrays in the western comedy period film "Damsel".<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=KOyEok2lNB0:BogHOg-nNDc:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=KOyEok2lNB0:BogHOg-nNDc:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?i=KOyEok2lNB0:BogHOg-nNDc:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=KOyEok2lNB0:BogHOg-nNDc:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?i=KOyEok2lNB0:BogHOg-nNDc:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
</div><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/reuters/INentertainmentNews/~4/KOyEok2lNB0" height="1" width="1" alt=""/></description>

		<link>http://feeds.reuters.com/~r/reuters/INentertainmentNews/~3/KOyEok2lNB0/british-actor-robert-pattinson-says-he-does-not-believe-in-true-love-idINKCN1G02DC</link>
        <guid isPermaLink="false">http://in.reuters.com/article/filmfestival-berlin-damsel/british-actor-robert-pattinson-says-he-does-not-believe-in-true-love-idINKCN1G02DC?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</guid>
        <category>entertainmentNews</category>
		<pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 14:28:05 +0530</pubDate>
		<feedburner:origLink>http://in.reuters.com/article/filmfestival-berlin-damsel/british-actor-robert-pattinson-says-he-does-not-believe-in-true-love-idINKCN1G02DC?feedType=RSS&feedName=entertainmentNews</feedburner:origLink></item>
<item>
		<title>Royal flush - Fashion label Sentaler basks in 'Meghan effect'</title>

		<description>LONDON (Reuters) - Canadian luxury outerwear brand Sentaler made its first foray into London Fashion Week on Friday, with a private showcase that aimed to capitalise on its recent association with Meghan Markle, the actress fiancée of Britain's Prince Harry.<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=eXZSXklVu18:efe7DR99yRI:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=eXZSXklVu18:efe7DR99yRI:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?i=eXZSXklVu18:efe7DR99yRI:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.reuters.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?a=eXZSXklVu18:efe7DR99yRI:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/reuters/INentertainmentNews?i=eXZSXklVu18:efe7DR99yRI:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a>
